insert.foreach:
insert into t_shipping_address
user_id,
real_name,
phone,
province,
city,
district,
address,
is_default,
version,
create_time,
update_time,
is_active,
#{item.userId},
#{item.realName},
#{item.phone},

mapper.delete:
delete from t_shipping_address where id in
#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_shipping_address
user_id = #{userId},
real_name = #{realName},
phone = #{phone},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
district = #{district},
address = #{address},
is_default = #{isDefault},
version = #{version},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_active = #{isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
where id = #{id} and version + 1 <= #{version}

update.foreach:
update t_shipping_address
user_id = #{item.userId},
real_name = #{item.realName},
phone = #{item.phone},
province = #{item.province},
city = #{item.city},
district = #{item.district},
address = #{item.address},
is_default = #{item.isDefault},
version = #{item.version},
create_time = #{item.createTime},
update_time = #{item.updateTime},
is_active = #{item.isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
version = version + 1,
where id = #{item.id}
